trans-unit.id: With Background Premium you can like a photo by double tapping.\nAll of them will be visible here.\nIf you have the Unsplash account, log in in the settings and Background will download all your liked photos.
trans-unit.source: With Background Premium you can like a photo by double tapping.\nAll of them will be visible here.\nIf you have the Unsplash account, log in in the settings and Background will download all your liked photos.
trans-unit.target: Avec Background Premium vous pouvez aimer une photo en appuyant deux fois.\nTous seront disponibles ici.\nSi vous avez un compte Unsplash, se connecter dans param√®tres et Background va t√©l√©charger tous vos photos aim√©s.

trans-unit.id:
With Background Premium you get:
No ads.
Search.
You can:
Save full resolution photos. 
Like photos (on Unsplash or locally).
With this one time in-app purchase you help me keep the app alive. Thanks!
